text: Yuliya Serhiyivna Sokolovska (; born 12 April 1985) is a Ukrainian activist, civil servant and politician. On 29 August 2019, she was appointed as the Minister of Social Policy of Ukraine. Deputy Head of the Office of the President of Ukraine. == Biography == She studied at the Kyiv National Economic University (2007). She also graduated from the National Academy of State Administration (2016). Since 2007, Sokolovska has worked in the private sector. Since 2009, she worked at the Kiev City State Administration. From 2014 to 2015, she headed the Document Management Department of the Ministry of Economic Development and Trade. From 2015 to 2016, Sokolovska served as Director of the Department of Social Budget Expenditures in the Ministry of Finance. From 2016 to 2017, she headed the Department of Strategic Planning and Coordination of State Policy of the Secretariat of Cabinet of Ministers. == See also == * Honcharuk Government == References == == External links == * * Ministry of Social Policy (in Ukrainian) Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Kyiv Category:Kyiv National Economic University alumni Category:National Academy of State Administration alumni Category:Ukrainian women activists Category:Ukrainian civil servants Category:Labor and social policy ministers of Ukraine Category:Independent politicians in Ukraine Category:Women government ministers of Ukraine Category:21st-century Ukrainian women politicians Category:21st-century Ukrainian politicians
title: Yuliya Sokolovska
